TopicTitle: Several mods wont work in creative mode, while it works in career mode! Help!

Articles.Content:
Can i repair this thing without deleting any mods? Those mods are: FAR, Infernal robotics and life support.

Thank you.
Gonna need more information. What is thing "thing" you speak of? The mods you mentioned should work both in sandbox and career with no problems.
Umm, yeah, usually people complain about things not working in "career mode"; I can guarantee from personal experience that F.A.R. works in Sandbox...

FAR, IR and both life support mods work in Career mode, I know because I run all three of them and then some.

And I have no clue what the OP is talking about.
